headline: Is It Too Late To Consider eBay After Its Strong 2025 Share Price Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether eBay's share price still offers value after a strong run, you are not alone. This article is going to tackle that question head on from a valuation angle. The stock has quietly climbed to about $82.91, delivering roughly 33.1% year to date and 32.9% over the last year, with a 103.5% gain over 3 years and 82.8% over 5 years that has clearly shifted how the market views its prospects and risk. Much of the recent interest has centered on eBay's push to sharpen its...

headline: BNP Paribas Notes eBay’s (EBAY) Key Role in Online Marketplace
summary: eBay Inc. (NASDAQ:EBAY) ranks among the best performing retail stocks in 2025. On November 24, BNP Paribas Exane began coverage of eBay Inc. (NASDAQ:EBAY) with a Neutral rating and a $90 price target. The firm acknowledged eBay as a “meaningful player in global e-commerce” but cautioned about the company’s future expansion. eBay’s Gross Merchandise Volume […]
